This is a Node.js + Express + TypeScript backend project for migrating from PHP.

## Project Structure
- Backend API using Express.js with TypeScript
- Modern JavaScript/TypeScript development practices
- JWT authentication for secure API access
- Database integration for data persistence
- Input validation and error handling
- Development and production environment configurations

## Migration Context
This project is migrating from a PHP backend to Node.js + Express + TypeScript.
The frontend uses React and will be updated to connect with the new API endpoints.

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow RESTful API design principles
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Include comprehensive API documentation
